body:
Hello Avicus and welcome to my first actual forum discussion!.

This discussion is made for you to ask me anything! But please don't ask me what age I am, nor my real name. Thanks! :D
body_tagged:

title: AMA! Here to make new friends!

replies.body: What servers did you play before avicus?
replies.body_tagged: What servers did you play before avicus?

replies.body:
Welcome to the Avicus Network!

If you have any questions or concerns, feel free to ask an experienced player or a staff member, as we will help you! ^o^

Do you like cake? If so, what type? :D

replies.body: Welcome! I've seen a little bit of you in game, but not enough to judge skill :P. Anyways welcome to the forums once again.

replies.body:
Welcome Sevo <3

Nice to see you here on the forums. :D :D

If one pizza plus another pizza equals two pizzas, what is melon?

replies.body:
1: I played on a server called sky realms that is on its way of death. That servers done. I am going to post my leaving post when the server's website becomes online.

2: Porky I have been on this server for about 1.5 to 2 years.It was actually my first server. If your wondering why I'm still prestige 1 it's because at the time I lagged a lot and was very bad at PvP.Also I like cheesecake and carrot cake.

3:Shadow,trust me,I'm good xD

4:It equals double pizza combo with melon cheese (idk how that tastes but melon pizza must be horrible)
